players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Alice, vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't do anything. Diana, maybe your investigation was wrong. Alice, you should investigate me. Maybe you're the real mafia."
You: "Diana, your investigation seems solid. Bob, why target me? I suspect you are mafia."
Bob: "Alice, vote for Diana. Diana, I trust you, but if you vote for Alice, we get justice."
Diana: "Bob is mafia, vote him. Alice, trust my investigation. Bob, you’re lying. Vote for Bob."
You: "Diana’s investigation is reliable. Bob is mafia and lying. He claims he didn’t do anything, but he killed Charlie. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Alice, vote Bob."
You: "I didn't do anything. Diana, maybe your investigation was wrong. Alice, you should investigate me. Maybe you're the real mafia."
Alice: "Diana, your investigation seems solid. Bob, why target me? I suspect you are mafia."
You: "Alice, vote for Diana. Diana, I trust you, but if you vote for Alice, we get justice."
Diana: "Bob is mafia, vote him. Alice, trust my investigation. Bob, you’re lying. Vote for Bob."
Alice: "Diana’s investigation is reliable. Bob is mafia and lying. He claims he didn’t do anything, but he killed Charlie. Vote Bob."
